General.Name: Yongan Futures Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Yongan Futures Co.,Ltd. offers commodity future and financial future brokerage services in China and internationally. It also provides wealth and asset management, and fund sales, as well as futures investment consulting services. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Yongan Futures Brokerage Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yongan Futures Co.,Ltd. in September 2012. Yongan Futures Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: Huafeng International Business Building, Hangzhou, China, 310005
